title: Samsung Galaxy M16 5G and Galaxy M06 5G launch date revealed
description: Samsung has been teasing its upcoming Galaxy M06 and Galaxy M16 smartphones, and we now have a launch date to look forward to. Both phones will be announced on Thursday, February 27 in India. Galaxy M16 is expected to launch with an AMOLED display and an Infinity-U notch, and we already know it will feature the Dimensity 6300 chipset, just like the Galaxy A16 5G. The M16 is expected to feature a similar spec sheet to the A-series counterpart with a larger battery. text: Samsung has been teasing its upcoming Galaxy M06 and Galaxy M16 smartphones, and we now have a launch date to look forward to. Both phones will be announced on Thursday, February 27 in India. Galaxy M16 is expected to launch with an AMOLED display and an Infinity-U notch, and we already know it will feature the Dimensity 6300 chipset, just like the Galaxy A16 5G. The M16 is expected to feature a similar spec sheet to the A-series counterpart with a larger battery. Samsung Galaxy M16's leaked renders The M06 is expected to share its specs with the recently announced Galaxy F06 5G. That phone features a 6.7-inch LCD (HD+ 60Hz), Dimensity 6300 chipset and a 5,000 mAh battery with 25W charging. Galaxy F06 5G in Bahama Blue and Lit Violet Source
html:
Samsung has been teasing its upcoming Galaxy M06 and Galaxy M16 smartphones, and we now have a launch date to look forward to. Both phones will be announced on Thursday, February 27 in India.

Galaxy M16 is expected to launch with an AMOLED display and an Infinity-U notch, and we already know it will feature the Dimensity 6300 chipset, just like the Galaxy A16 5G. The M16 is expected to feature a similar spec sheet to the A-series counterpart with a larger battery.


Samsung Galaxy M16's leaked renders

The M06 is expected to share its specs with the recently announced Galaxy F06 5G. That phone features a 6.7-inch LCD (HD+ 60Hz), Dimensity 6300 chipset and a 5,000 mAh battery with 25W charging.


Galaxy F06 5G in Bahama Blue and Lit Violet

Source
